Titles.opensheetat: Abra a ficha de personagem em {tab}

sheetbuttontab.name: Sheet button tab
sheetbuttontab.descrp: The tab opended when the sheet tab above the portrait is clicked

rollinitiative.name: Initiative mode
rollinitiative.descrp: The behaviour when the initiative button above the portrait is clicked

showpartybutton.name: Show Party button
showpartybutton.descrp: Shows a button linking to the characters party in the portrait

showfamiliarmaster.name: Show Familiar/Master button
showfamiliarmaster.descrp: Shows a button linking to the characters Familiar/Master in the portrait

shownpctraits.name: Show NPC traits
shownpctraits.descrp: If NPC triats should be displayed in the character portrait

panondblclick.name: Pan on portrait doubleclick
panondblclick.descrp: Camera pans to the current token when the portrait image is double clicked

reversesaveskilllore.name: Reverse save, skill, lore
reversesaveskilllore.descrp: Reverses the order to lore skill saves

filtertrainedactions.name: Filter trained actions
filtertrainedactions.descrp: If the actions that can not be used due to the character not being trained in the appropiate skill should be hidden

showtrainedrankletter.name: Show trained rank letter
showtrainedrankletter.descrp: Shows a letter next to saves & skills to indicate the training rank

skillrankiconscale.name: Trained rank letter scale
skillrankiconscale.descrp: The scale of the rank letter for saves & skills

onlyonespellrank.name: Only one spell rank open
onlyonespellrank.descrp: Closes all other spell rank panels when a spell rank is opened

directStaffuse.name: Direct Staff use
directStaffuse.descrp: If magical Staves should be used as spell casting items instead of weapons by default

consumableswap.name: Consumeables swapable
consumableswap.descrp: If consumables that can be held should have an action icon to swap them into the active weapon set

reduceAoO.name: Reduce Attack of Opportunity buttons
reduceAoO.descrp: If buttons connected to Attack of Opportunity should be reduced in size/hidden

usetakecover.name: Use take cover
usetakecover.descrp: If the take cover action should be used (instead of being posted to the chat)

macrobuttons.name: Number of macro buttons
macrobuttons.descrp: The number of displayed macro buttons ((shift)right click to open macro folder, drag & drop to choose macro, shift left click to remove macro)

consumableuse.name: Consumable click behaviour
consumableuse.descrp: What should happen when a consumable item is clicked:

onitemiconscale.name: Info icon scale
onitemiconscale.descrp: The scale of info icons on item buttons

iconshadow.name: Info icon shadow intensity
iconshadow.descrp: The intensity of the info icon contrast shadow on item buttons

showpassives.name: Mostar passivas dos NPCs
showpassives.descrp: If the passives of NPCs should be shown

showmacrocategory.name: Mostrar a categoria do macro
showmacrocategory.descrp: If a macro category should be shown in the HUD (based on the macros in the Foundry macro bar)
